img_above_text:
# Lang-Baw-Baw
Lang-Baw-Baw is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This frog boss is the final of the six you can find across the chapters.
## Lang-Baw-Baw Boss Fight and Guide

When you get to the edge, look down to see a muddy clearing. Down here, you can find the next optional boss, which is the final frog Lang-Baw-Baw.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring the optional boss Lang-Baw-Baw, a large frog-like creature. Set in a dark, forested area with a muddy clearing, the boss is shown in an aggressive stance, ready to engage the player in battle. This image is part of the "Lang-Baw-Baw Boss Fight and Guide" section of the document, illustrating the environment and the formidable appearance of the final frog boss encountered in Chapter 6.
